title: Vajrayana
summary: Vajrayﾄ］a (Sanskrit: "thunderbolt vehicle" or "diamond vehicle")  along with Mantrayﾄ］a, Guhyamantrayﾄ］a, Tantrayﾄ］a, Tantric Buddhism and Esoteric Buddhism are names referring to Buddhist traditions associated with Tantra and "Secret Mantra", which developed in the medieval Indian subcontinent and spread to Tibet, East Asia, Mongolia and other Himalayan states.
